original_title: Extreme Noise Terror: From One Extreme to the Other
overview: Recorded live at the Fulham Greyhound in London, England, United Kingdom  in 1989.
tagline: 01. Deceived / 02. False Prophet  /  03. Murder / 04. We the Helpless /  05. Use Your Mind / 06. Take the Strain /  07.Bullshit Propaganda /  08. Conned Through Life / 09. Another Nail in the Coffin / 10. Raping the Earth / 11. Show Us You Care / 12. Interview.
title: Extreme Noise Terror: From One Extreme to the Other
